00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   Amplify.h
00006 
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008   
00009   This rewritten class supports a smart Amplify effect - it calculates
00010   the maximum amount of gain that can be applied to all tracks without
00011   causing clipping and selects this as the default parameter.
00012 
00013 **********************************************************************/
00014 
00015 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_AMPLIFY__
00016 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_AMPLIFY__
00017 
00018 #include <wx/button.h>
00019 #include <wx/checkbox.h>
00020 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00021 #include <wx/intl.h>
00022 #include <wx/slider.h>
00023 #include <wx/textctrl.h>
00024 
00025 #include "SimpleMono.h"
00026 
00027 class WaveTrack;
00028 
00029 class EffectAmplify:public EffectSimpleMono
00030 {
00031  friend class AmplifyDialog;
00032 
00033  public:
00034    EffectAmplify();
00035 
00036    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00037       return wxString(_("Amplify..."));
00038    }
00039 
00040    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00041       std::set<wxString> result;
00042       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#AmplifierPlugin"));
00043       return result;
00044    }
00045 
00046    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00047       return wxString(wxT("Amplify"));
00048    }
00049 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00051       return wxString(_("Amplifying"));
00052    }
00053    
00054    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00055    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00056 
00057    virtual bool Init();
00058 
00059    virtual bool PromptUser();
00060    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00061    
00062  protected:
00063    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00064 
00065  private:
00066    float ratio;
00067    float peak;
00068 };
00069

00083    bool TransferDataFromWindow();

00090    void OnAmpSlider(wxCommandEvent & event);
00091    void OnClipCheckBox(wxCommandEvent & event);
00092    void OnPreview( wxCommandEvent &event );
00093 
00094    void CheckClip();
00095 
00096  private:
00097    wxSlider *mAmpS;
00098    wxTextCtrl *mAmpT;
00099    wxTextCtrl *mPeakT;
00100    wxCheckBox *mClip;
